items.summary: AI agents are moving from demos to daily workflows. They write code, run commands, and complete multi-step tasks without constant hand-holding. items.title: oven-sh/bun bun-v1.3.10
items.summary:
To install Bun v1.3.10
```bash
curl -fsSL https://bun.sh/install | bash
# or you can use npm
# npm install -g bun
```

Windows:
```bash
powershell -c "irm bun.sh/install.ps1|iex"
```

To upgrade to Bun v1.3.10:
```bash
bun upgrade
```

### [Read Bun v1.3.10's release notes on Bun's
items.reason: Bun v1.3.10 release ‚Äì includes installation instructions and upgrade notes; useful for a Bun version tracking article.
